nodes.text: The third season of Star Wars: Clone Wars originally aired from March 21 to March 25, 2005 (Chapters 21–25). It comprises Volume Two. Season Three was based on early plot outlines of the novel Labyrinth of Evil, by James Luceno. It thus follows the basic plot of that book. However, since it was made separately from the book, there were some continuity issues between the two.
